O camping possui banheiros e agua encanada sim e tambem energia eletrica. Vocês devem estar se confundindo com os moradores do outro lado do arroio que cobram só estacionamento e não possuem agua encanada nem banheiro nem energia eletrica.
Nos somos registrados como Camping da Prainha. e para tirar suas duvidas nosso endereço é pra quem vem do Monte Bonito deve atravessar o arroio Pelotas mais conhecido como arroio do Pilão.
Em anexo mando fotos para tirar duvidas!

Por ser barato, mt ruim, banheiro sem condições de uso e sem agua potavel... som alto com musicas de total desrespeito com quem vai para curtir com a família, pior lugar que ja fui, o que salvou o dia foi um salvamento de uma criança que os pais bebados n viram que estava se afogando, sorte da criança que meu tio estava olhando e conseguiu salvar
O banho e bom é o que salva, não tem água encanada e nem banheiro.

name: Campamento Los Conejos
location: Carretera Pachuca Tampico Km. 7.5, Mineral del Chico, Hgo., Mexico
comments:
Un bonito Valle con pequeñas chozas (no son cabañas en forma) con literas colgantes.  Si deseas quedarte a dormir ahí, hay que ir muy bien equipado!  En la noche las temperaturas pueden fácilmente registrar bajo cero.

Por el momento, los baños son amplios y arbolados :) pero ya están construyendo unos que esperamos mantengan limpios.

Me encantó este lugar, hay zona de camping, cabañas, parrilla, fogatas donde te venden leña y hasta regaderas. Lo ideal es llevarte todos tus víveres para no tener que estar saliendo del bosque. Un buen lugar para ir a caminar, correr y hacer ejercicio. La zona está protegida por un guardabosques y esto permite que este muy limpio y muy cuidado. El costo del acceso es muy económico a solo $150. Hermoso!

Esta exactamente en medio del bosque, siempre hay vigilancia si no hay nadie solo es cuestión de esperar. Para pasar la noche hay lugar para acampar o hay cabañas también. Hay baños y agua para poder hervirla y ocuparla en el campamento. Hay lugar amplio para estacionamiento y juegos para los niños. Excelente!
Excelente lugar para ir a caminar, correr. Tiene el mejor mirador del Estado
Cuanto cobran??

name: Recreation Center Waterfalls
location: Carretera Villa Km 5, Chapa de Mota, Méx., Mexico
comments: Muy buen lugar, como siempre la gente se queja de todo si no les parece visiten un lugar de 5 estrellas yo lo recomiendo mucho sobre todo por su naturaleza y lugar para acampar, las cabanas cuentan con lo necesario.
Pésimo lugar, instalaciones super viejas, comida cara y la gente no respeta en las albercas se meten a nadar con todo y jeans, no lo recomiendo para nada
Él lugar grandioso,las albercas muy limpias y el acceso al balneario sólo son $60 pesos por persona solo la señora de los dulces y refrescos son caros $ 25 pesos una coca de 600 se pasó...
Muy bonito solo que el agua esta muy fría
Excente lugar, muy amplio, algo frío pero para acampar esta genial !

name: La Choza de Barro
location: Calle Reforma 27, San Sebastian Xolalpa, 55840 San Juan Teotihuacan de Arista, Méx., Mexico

name: Spring Valley RV Park
comments: The owner Mrs. Ann is a cold heartless woman. When my husband and myself checked in we informed Mrs. Ann that I was going to need a spot for 3 months due to the fact my husband was still stationed in Ga on active duty and I took a job here earlier than his report day. Everything was fine at first until Mrs. Ann got an offer from Duke energy to stay at her campground, she then told me I had to leave with 3 days notice and we hadn't even been there a month!!! I tried to explain to her that my husband had the truck down in Ga that we used to move the fifth wheel, she didn't care and she demanded that my husband take a day off from the military to come move us!!! I told Mrs. Ann that the military didn't work like that, that my husband can't just take a day off and come up here and move us after he thought he had already took care of us one time and Mrs. Ann got money hungry and decided to kick out a mother (disabled Veteran) and her two kids. This women is a monster and not a good person!!! She tried everything she could to make me go off on her, thankfully I'm not that type of person!!!! Kamar will get her in the end!!!!

This RV Park has all the ingredients to be amazing with its proximity to FT Bragg and other places of interest. The complaints are to numerous to list but if peace and quite are what you are looking for you can forget about it. If you're someone that likes to sit out side in the evening in peace, with their gounds maintenance schedule, it's impossible! Nobody wants to be around with a blower or weed wacker blaring...case in point...Im writing this review because I'm so irritated with the racket outside, happening as I write this. Owners or at least the poeple keeping it up and running are not operating the park with any business sense.

Have had a great experience here !!! Very nice people I have never been here before drove all the way from Michigan my ATM would not let me get any money out when I got here they let me catch up with them a couple days after I got setteled In. It's been quiet so far no problem being close to the road it's off a service drive, witch is great for rideing my bike or jogging and very  convenient to any store or restaurant of your choice . Perfect pull through site set up in 15 min. I have no problem coming back in the future they keep the campground neatly groomed. I did read the other reviews I'm not sure what happen but to each as own you can't make everybody happy. God bless y'all And yes I'm a Yankee:)

To me, a "One" means you would never stay there again, a "Two" means you would if that was your only choice.  I give it a "Two".  If I come back to Fayetteville, I will do everything in my power to not stay here.  There was not a blade of grass or a piece of gravel to be found.  Everything was blow sand which makes a mess of your RV.  Plus, we were the only RVer's in the campground.  Everyone else were transient workers, some of which had "homesteaded" in the park.  If  I have to, I will.  I would prefer not!

Most likely wont ever stay. Had an emergency with a water heater, and with 3 kids and medical conditions, yet wouldn't even let us pay for a camp site price just to use the shower facility after being in 103 heat index, and no plumber until Monday or Tuesday.

Remek kemping – is lehetne. Nagyon szerencsés helyen, közvetlen a parton, pár lépésre egy nagyon jó kis étteremtől – Platánus büfé – a RÉV-től, nem messze Siófoktól. Szemben a csodálatos Tihanyi panoráma, ahova a komppal 10 perc az út. A személyzet normális, udvarias, sőt, egy nagyon lelkes és lelkiismeretes takarítónővel is találkoztam, aki egész nap teszi a dolgát, mindig feltűnik valahol. A probléma a kemping hozzáállása a látogatói létszámhoz: folyamatosan, már többszörös teltháznál még mindig beengedik a megszállni vágyókat, a kemping inkább menekülttáborhoz hasonlított, mint  pihenőhelyhez. Egymás szájában, előterében, a játszótéren, a sportpályán, egymás hegyén hátán a sátrak, lakókocsik, emberek, kutyák, gyerekek. És ez minden egyéb kiszolgáló egységre is kihat. Biztosan vannak nagyon kellemes nyugodt időszakok – mondjuk télen? Más:  „gyerekebarát kemping”: semmilyen szervezett foglalkozás nincs, de a gyerekek azt csinálnak amit akarnak: kb. éjfélig szaladgálnak, bicikliznek, ordítoznak. Túlélőtábornak elmegy. Főszezonban KEMPINGezésre, pihenésre nem való, megszállni jó.

name: Sellő Kemping

A jobb helyeket a régi káder időszakból megmaradt vendégeknek tartják fent.
Ennél sokkal korrektebb kempingek vannak a balatonon, érdemes elkerülni.

Amikor körbe kerékpározzuk a Balatont, mindig útba ejtjük ezt a kempinget. Nagyon kis nyugodt, családias.

Nice and friendly. Lovely view.

Szép a környezet, de sokkal többet is ki lehetne hozni belőle. Jó az ötlet, de sajnos sok a "szocreál-fíling", még annál is több, mint egyébként egy baráti összeröffenést vagy munkahelyi csapatépítőt kiszolgáló hely elbír. Most úgy érzem, többet ide nem jönnék, de szurkolok a helynek, hogy legyen elég ötlete és forrása, hogy javítson a külcsínen, szolgáltatásokon és a komforton (a legjobb értékelést a mosdó kapná, de az tényleg), mert ez már kevés...

Szuper camping! Tiszta zuhany, tiszta wc, szép kilátás, segítőkészek a vendéglátók.
Bicikli bérlés, kajak bérlés, enni-inni való. 
Különleges sátorhelyek, szép jurták.

Igazán különleges szálláshely. Programokat is szerveznek. Aki Baranyába jön nyaralni, mindenképpen nézze meg a honlapjukat. Nyíltvizi úszást is szerveznek minden évben 4,2 és 1,8 kilométeren sokkal barátibb áron, mint a méregdrága Balaton-átúszás

name: Balatontourist Camping Mirabella (Ex Car)
location: Zamárdi, Szent István u. 3512 hrsz., 8621 Hungary
comments:
Really good camping ⛺ Clean and tidy.
Service is really friendly. Worth recommending!
Nice place,  very good stuf.  But there should be better tiolets,  showers, etc. For this kind of camps with prices like it is should be diferent.
Good place to spend the holiday at, has a pool too, it is a very children friendly place

This campsite is very clean and good located. All staff are helpful, happy and polite. Toilets and showers was always clean. In your price are included kithen and electricity. If you are in a tent, beach is not to far (maybe 3 minutes). Entry to the Balaton is very easy (for children as well). Balaton (on this place) is not very deep (good for some activities). This part of Balaton (campsite as well) is beautiful.
Great place, great food, beautyful view

name: Camping Mandriale
location: Route de Lozzi, RD81, 20130 Cargèse, France
comments:
Campeggio nuovo gestito da un ragazzo gentilissimo, disponibile, affabile che parla diverse lingue tra cui l'italiano. Poco fuori dal paese, è immerso nella pace e arrampicato su una collina alberata dalla quale si vede in lontananza il mare.di notte si vedono stellate pazzesche e scorci di via lattea che solitamente vedo solo in alta montagna. i servizi sono puliti e il tutto è ben organizzato e essenziale. Ci sono anche i giochi gonfiabili per bambini e una piccola fattoria con una cinquantina di animali.al ristorante si mangia cibo prodotto solo dagli animali dell'allevamento del padre del gestore del campeggio. I piatti sono abbondanti e buonissimi, il prezzo è ottimo confrontato allo standard della corsica. Favolosi sono il maxiburger e le salsicce. Sicuramente un campeggio dove soggiornare o anche un ristorante dove cenare.
Se dovessi trovare un difetto......è troppo lontano da milano. Se fosse più vicino ogni tanto andrei a fare un weekend dal mitico Lisandro

Nous avons séjourné 15 jours au Camping Le Mandriale (Fin juillet/début août 2017) avec notre enfant. Le camping est flambant neuf, très propre, ombragé avec vue sur la mer. Une multitude de plages sont accessibles a quelques minutes de voiture. Le restaurant propose des menus simples, copieux avec des produits issus de leur exploitation, et pour couronner le tout a prix abordables (pour une fois qu'on ne se sent pas pris pour des vaches à lait). Je profite de cette occasion pour remercier à nouveau l'ensemble du personnel qui s'est plié en 4 pour rendre notre séjour le plus agréable possible....on se croyait presque en famille ! Nous ne manquerons pas de vous rendre visite lors de notre prochaine escapade en Corse.

Au plaisir de vous revoir  !

Famille Gohier

Se fosse solo per il campeggio non ci sarebbe nulla di male da dire. Peccato che bar e ristorante (gestiti direttamente all'interno del campeggio dagli stessi proprietari) tendano esplicitamente a guadagnare...un po' troppo. Invitati a cenare lì, dopo non aver badato a spese tra bere a mangiare, ci è stato proposto di assaggiare il mirto della casa (che pensavamo offerto......). Come risultato sono arrivati due mini bicchieri di "grappa al mirto" (non mirto) fatti poi pagare la modica cifra di 8€... Piccolezze che danno purtroppo segnali chiari.. e poi 2 cappucci e 2 croissant... 7€! Fate campeggio ma andate altrove a mangiare

Le camping est neuf et très bien entretenu (emplacement, sanitaire)
Gros plus pour les emplacements en terrasse avec vue sur mer sur le haut du camping, ombragés et suffisamment grand pour ne pas être dérangé par les voisins. Point d'eau et électricité pour chaque emplacement. Produits frais et de qualité au restaurant qui propose également une formule déjeuner complet ! Bref, nous avons passé un excellent séjour, presque un peu trop court. Camping à chaudement recommander pour sa convivialité et sa qualité sur tous les plans.

Accueil super sympa de la part des tous.
Les places de tente sont top
Les sanitaires propres et bien équipés 
Le camping fait aussi restaurant et propose des viandes de leur exploitation d'une excellente qualité et très bien cuisiné. 
Le tout pour un prix très très abordable ! (Resto / pers : 15€) 
Je recommande !!!

name: Ideal Camping
comments: It depends. If you just wan't a place for overnight stay, you will have the right adress at ideal camping. Mobile home tent or motorbike...no problem. But you need a good  camping equipement. Because sanitary area is very old but very clean. Unfortunatly no toilett seat at ceramic bowl. Friendly people and prices are quite good. 15-20€ per tent and care with two peoples per night. Beach is near by (300m).
Additional charges for electricity

Grandios nice and quite camping beyond shadow spending trees. Its quite cooling there. The village itself is boring - but you stay here to enjoy the Fango River! There are a bakery and a Spar Supermarket near by.

Ambiente sporco e disordinato , WiFi inesistente, Internet solo sul Pc di loro proprieta a pagamento 4,00€. al giorno. Scelta la formula paga in hotel il proprietario ha preteso in più €. 19,00 in contanti (mi sono fatta rilasciare ricevuta ) asserendo che Logitravel ha sbagliato il prezzo a notte) evitando discussioni abbiamo pagato la prenotazione anticipata  per 6 giorni , il quinto giorno la mia camera era stata affittata ad altre persone , chiedendo spiegazioni ha picchiato un nostro amico , è venuto direttamente in camera e prendendomi per un braccio mi ha buttato fuori dicendomi che la mia camera era stata già venduta e che la prenotazione per lui non era più valida . vi sconsiglio caldamente questa struttura che tra l'altro non è un albergo ma un camping

Pernottato in camera. Al nostro arrivo bruciature di sigaretta sulle lenzuola e capelli nel letto. La tavoletta del water era in gommapiuma, rotta, ed emanava un cattivo odore. La proprietaria ci ha cambiato camera senza problemi ma siamo comunque andati via un giorno prima rinunciando ad una notte già pagata tanto erano pessime le condizioni del luogo

name: Bella Vista
location: Route de Pietra Maggiore, 20260 Calvi, France
comments: Very decent camping on the edge of Calvi. Easily within walking distance into both the town and the beach. Wonderful staff at reception. Very clean facilities; bathrooms, showers and sinks all well kept. Camp ground has access to electricity. Only thing I wouldn't recommend about the site in the small Pizzeria on site; though the food itself is decent and properly priced, the service is below average.
Accueil très agréable. Camping aéré très calme. Je recommande le snack avec sa patronne très sympa ses choix de plats très variés et préparés devant vous par le cuisto.

Propreté irréprochable. Jamais vu mieux ailleurs. Les sanitaires du fond sont neufs et très bien pensés.
Le camping est calme et bien entretenu.
La mer, le port de Calvi, et les supermarchés sont proches : moins de 20 minutes de marche.
À recommander

Accueil sympathique,  camping calme et ombragé. Sanitaires très propres. 
Proche du centre de Calvi et à 700m de la plage. Snack au top,  nous y avons mangé les meilleurs hamburgers, les pizzas sont excellentes. 
L'ensemble du personnel pour ce camping est gentil. Il manque juste la piscine... 
On le recommande vivement.
Accueil très sympathique. Camping calme et très bien entretenu. Des emplacements spacieux. Des sanitaires avec papier et savon.

name: Pineta Sul Mare Camping Village
comments: Nice place.

Abbiamo trascorso un periodo piuttosto lungo questa estate al camping pineta sul mare. Abbiamo soggiornato in una mobile home luna immersa in una bella pineta e vicina al parco giochi del campeggio,anch'esso sotto la pineta. Già in fase di prenotazione abbiamo notato una gentilezza e professionalità particolari. Abbiamo avuto esigenze particolari dato il lungo soggiorno con una bimba di tre anni e siamo sempre stati prontamente accontentati. Ottima la piscina adatta anche ai bimbi più piccoli e timorosi,molto gradevole l'animazione serale per i bimbi con baby dance e qualche spettacolo di burattini. Se poi si voleva qualche intrattenimento in più bastava andare nell' adiacente Cesenatico camping village,dove per altro c'era di tutto dall'estetista,al parrucchiere, al supermercato despar oltre che ad un presidio medico tutte le mattine.
La spiaggia convenzionata dove noi siamo stati,Top story, era molto vicina,pulita e ben attrezzata e raggiungibile a piedi o in bici o con un simpatico trenino navetta apprezzato dai bimbi e non solo!campeggio super consigliato a famiglie con bimbi e ragazzi.

Ottimo campeggio, ideale per chi cerca tranquillità.
Non molto grande, adattissimo alle famiglie con bambini..la piscina per i piccoli é perfetta, acqua bassa, spruzzi, scivolo...la piscinetta con l'acqua più alta (120cm circa) é piccolina, ma funge allo scopo!
Tutti i servizi del camping Cesenatico sono a disposizione dei clienti del Pineta sul mare, purtroppo non é comodissimo, ma se non si hanno pretese particolari e si vuol godere di una bella vacanza all'insegna del mare e della tranquillità il camping é perfetto.
Grande cortesia da parte dello staff...simpatia smisurata dei gestori del piccolo bar della piscina.
Consigliato

Arrivato oggi, ed è stato sufficiente per smentire tante recensioni negative che avevo letto. Al contrario sono stati oggi molto gentilì, sia alla reception che al bar, e la piscina è fantastica per i Bambini. La spiaggia è vicina a soli 800 m. La navetta c'è ma si può fare tranquillamente a piedi. Inoltre la.spiaggia non è chilometrica e quindi anche stando nelle ultime file si riescono a controllare i bambini da lontano a riva. Alla reception hanno dato tutte le spiegazioni esaustive. Trovata bottiglia di vino di benvenuto. Baby dance ok, per più animazione basta andare campeggio a fianco, è vicino. Bungalow non nuovo ma c'è tutto, consegnato pulito, ha due bagni due docce e cessi disinfettati. Ovvio che molte cose sono soggettive e poi casi particolari possono accadere. Forse avranno anche fatto tesoro delle critiche... Buon lavoro e buone vacanze.

Campeggio tranquillo e ben curato. Bella piscina con scivolo adatta ai più piccoli. Trenino-navetta gratuito che collega il campeggio al centro di Zadina, alla spiaggia, all'adiacente campeggio Cesenatico e ad altri punti strategici (esempio minimarket)

name: Camping Sole e Vista Corsican port
location: Centre Ville D81, 20150 Porto Corse, France
comments: Camping is really well located, 1 minute from SPAR marche (the most expensive we found in our trip) and 15 minutes by foot to the city center. The tent places are well divided one with the other and you can have your privacy. The swimming pool is very nice with a view on the sea and Porto but it is not manageable during the crowded hours (from 4pm to 7pm).  Toilets are cleaned and you can park your car close to the tent but not next to it. Lot of places to get electricity. You have to pay to use shared refrigerators.
The camping is very nice and the staff is very cool (which is quite a rare quality for campsite owners in Corsica).
We wanted to check out earlier (we announced our departure time the day before) but there was noone at the reception so we almost missed our ferry home.
Suitably located Camping as The Gate to Heart of Corsica

Steep terraces, free wifi didn't work, expensive, very inflexible and commercial  owners (paying is only possible at the "highest" reception building). Noisy. Good for 1 night, but better look elsewhere.

name: Camping d'Arone
comments: Nice location with a lot of space, trees provide shadow and privacy. close to the beach. Only one sanitary station for the whole park. Ran out of baguette very early in the morning.

Hike to the tower in the evening and enjoy the glowing red granite
Location: 5
Coziness: 4
Freedom: 5
Sanitary: 4
Shade: 5
We visited the place in 05/2016
Nice camp 450 m from beach. Clean bathrooms, small shop, normal camp.

We expected a lot more from this camp site. Strange practice of taking your ID for them to keep till your departure, no electricity despite being paid for, combined bathrooms and toilets, which werent very clean and a really distant beach with a severly limited access due to the area restricted to boat parking.
Large campsite, toilets clean, small shop in the camp. About 5 minutes on foot to sea.

name: Camping Funtana a Ora
comments:
Great place and great staff at Camping Funtana a Ora! I've been there just for one night traveling with my bicycle and arriving on 18.Oct.2017.
Thank you for the hospitality and most of all thanks to the people coming from Targu Jiu ;).
On a next vacation in Corsica I will definitely return at Camping Funtana a Ora as I heard they have a delicious pizza also.

“Great for families but also people looking for some peace”

So in general if you are looking for a good Camping in Porto, this is the one and only good option. It is way better than the others which are situated more in the center of Porto which makes them more crowded, noisier and more "commercial". 

Funtana a l'Ora is also quite full in the full season, but it's big and it has many trees (they give a lot of nice shade) and other obstacles, like huge rocks, which makes the places for tents a bit more private. One can hide a bit and have some privacy. 

Toilets and other facilities are nice and clean. 
WiFi is available for free but the quality is far from good. 
There is a bar available with beer etc and where one can buy some basic food stuff (EXPENSIVE) and order a pizza (around 10 EUR). 

As in the title - good for bigger families. But if you are a backpack traveller, you can get sometimes annoyed by the amount of people there beside of the things I wrote above.

Quiet, clean facilities, car parking right next to the tent possible, wide area in terraces, really friendly welcome. A lot of shadow from big trees and electricity almost everywhere. They also have a pool and a place to play table tennis.

LOCALISATION: VERY GOOD ;  many quiet places on the camp; no direct acces to sea but enough close by car, direct acces to natural swimming pool in the river - MARVELLOUS !!!

CAMPSITE: GOOD ; gravel ground; a lot of shaded, nice places separated by boulders and rocks, swimming pool EXCELLENT, small shop and restaurant OK

FACILITIES & TOILETS: GOOD ; but as in all corsican campings NO toilet paper, NO soap (!!!)
STAFF: english speaking, nice, helpfull

PRICE: COULD BE MORE FAMILIY FRIENDLY.... BUT GENERALLY - OK

OTHER:  wi fi -free but extremely hard to log in, electricity - free :-)

GENERAL:  4 Google stars out of 5 (max)
Camping funtana

name: Camping Fuente De La Pascuala
location: Carretera Tranco, 0 S-N Km 55, 23291, Jaén, Spain
comments: He ido .

name: Campeggio Classe Di Poggioli Maria Luisa E C. Snc
location: Viale Catone, 81, 48124 Lido di Dante RA, Italy
comments: ottimo.... buon servizio recepsyon
E un luogo tranquillo per bambini e persone anziane

name: Camping Río Segura
location: Ctra. Yeste-Santiago de la Espada, Km. 18, 02480 Yeste, Albacete, Spain
comments: Parcelas suficientemente grandes. Servicios muy limpios y en perfecto estado. Se echa de menos el césped en el suelo. Pocas sombras.
El entorno una maravilla!!!! Naturaleza y río con cascadas pequeñas  a 200 metros del camping. Idóneo para bañarse   😊 y disfrutar del agua muy limpia.Zonas para niños son peligro.
El mejor sitio para realizar todo tipo de deporte al aire libre, aunque también para pasar un rato con amigos y baños en un río espectacular

Un lugar para desconectar del estrés diario. En la sierra del segura donde te puedes pegar un baño en el rio Segura. El personal del campig es de lo mas familiar solucionando todos los poblemas del dia a dia le doy 100 estrellas...hay que vivirlo y no te iras nunca yo estoy ya 10 años y los que quedan...un saludo y como siempre QUE LA FUERZA OS ACOMPAÑÉ....
Super tranquilo y mis hijos corren sin peligro. Agradable para relajarse con piscina y servicio correcto. Buena proporcion calidad-precio. Aconsejable 100%

name: Villaggio Pineta
comments: Offers everything you need - shop, restaurant, facilities and access to beach. Cleanliness in shower and toilet is poor (at least in off season) - didn't see a cleaner once! Good location though, close to restaurants and a great forest across the road for walks and bike rides.

Ottimo per famiglie e non solo ... pulito e molto ordinato ... soluzioni abitative origina e confortevoli adatte a tutte le tasche .... ben servito il minimarket  e annastanza conveniente per essere interno a un villaggio turistico ... c è anche un ottimo bar ristorante pizzeria che offre anche servizio mezza pensione o completa per chi non ha voglia di cucinare nel bungalow ... una sala giochi e animazione bimbi eccellente ... dotato di piscina baby e adulti e da quest' anno anche spiaggia privata a pagamento molto ben gestita con ottime strutture anche questa fornita di ottimo ristorante  .... una volta privato non puoi fare a meno di tornarci ... ormai sono 8 anni che ci vado e ci tornerò di sicuro per molti anni a venire!!!! .... non mi hanno pagato per questa recensione 😜😜😜😂🤣😂🤣😂😎😎😎

Lo consiglierei con qualche riserva. Il campeggio è in una posizione molto comoda, sul mare, e a pochi passi dal centro di Milano Marittima quindi perfetto. E' tenuto molto bene con maxi caravan e servizi molto puliti. Devo, però, sconsigliare vivamente il servizio di pensione del ristorante interno (pensione completa nel mio caso) in quanto vengono proposti piatti da mensa per non parlare della varietà: pasta aglio olio e peperoncino, pasta al pesto (2 volte in 1 settimana), pasta con burro e salvia (mai sentito), pasta con panna e altro, cotoletta di pesce (2 volte in 1 settimana).. insomma piatti da poter preparare in poco tempo con la propria cucina del bungalow e con un certo risparmio rispetto ai 23,50 euro/giorno. A parte noi, i clienti occasionali che ordinavano alla carta avevano un servizio diverso con piatti più invitanti e tempi di attesa ridotti. Non capisco la strategia del titolare/gestore, sicuramente sarebbe meglio non proporre un servizio del genere. 
Anche per il servizio spiaggia non c'è stata molta trasparenza, non ho ben capito qual'è il prezzo per i convenzionati del campeggio: a quanto pare mi sarebbe convenuto prendere l'ombrellone giorno per giorno piuttosto che l'intera settimana; non c'è stata molta convenienza! 
Se ci dovessi tornare.. so bene di cosa usufruire!

Abbiamo soggiornato nel ponte del 2 giugno. Camping accogliente, accesso diretto al mare, minimarket, bar e ristorante. Spiaggia sabbiosa e adatta ai bambini. Ottima la piscina gratuita. Servizi comodi e puliti. Con la bici si raggiunge facilmente il centro di Milano Marittima. Piazzola larga, ma la nostra sabbiosa leggermente sopraelevata rispetto alla strada.

Prezzi onesti. Servizi puliti e ben distribuiti. Personale gentile e accogliente. Nel mio periodo di permanenza il wifi non funzionava correttamente e le zanzare erano decisamente troppe. Del resto buona la posizione rispetto al centro e al mare.

name: Zona De Acampada Controlada Paraje De Las Fuentes
comments: Estupendas instalaciones y lugar precioso cerca del pueblo de Letur. Eva,quien lo gestiona,tiene un 10.
Calidad precio escelente los aseos un poco lejos
Yo me lo paso genial,micha naturaleza y senderos para recorrer
Perfecto lugar, sencillo, tranquilo y muy cerca de Letur. Un pueblo precioso y sorprendente. El precio super asequible. Como única pega es la distancia desde las parcelas hasta los aseos.
El mejor sitio para descansar y pasar unos días en familia rodeados de naturaleza

name: Village Barricade | Natural Park of the Po Delta
location: Strada del Mare, 74, 45018 Bonelli RO, Italy
comments:
Clean? If that is a requirement for you than you should avoid this place.  
Pros: Animation and most staff are friendly - pools are nice - beach is nice -
Cons:  Of the 4 doors in my trailer 3 were broken - you are required to pay for cleaning and still need to clean the place before you can move in as their idea of cleaning is a quick sweep mom and wipe the counter - the showers and toilet are gross - dogs everywhere as they no longer have designated areas for dogs - trailer smelled like wet dog (requested a trailer in a dog free zone and they said no problem but when they dont have dog free zones they tried to tell me that the trailer had no dogs previously but the smell was the tell.  Customer no service "Im sorry thats terrible but enjoy your stay" . I am pretty sure all of the employees are terrified of the "Director" as they all walk on eggshells around him.  This was our second and last trip here.

Excellent camping! Friendly staff, perfect animation for kids of all ages in the day and evening.(Disco, beach party, fireworks, sport tournaments etc etc...) Allot of sport facility's(Soccer 2x, tennis, volleybal, fitness)  verry nice and clean pools, nice beach. Diving school( With nice and friendly dog assistent�) that has good prices. Introduction dive in the pool for 5 euro. Good food(especially the pizza's) also for a good price. Drinks also reasonable priced. Go out for a night in The Netherlands and you pay more for your coctails. Supermarket with everything you need for  reasonable prices for a campingshop. Payd allot more at supermarkets on other campings. Maybe the big supermarket 25 min away is cheaper, but if you drive over there with the car it also includes diesel costs and you can enjoy your holiday for 50 minutes less because of the drive to the supermarket and back,  so you can better shop at the campingshop and it will cost you nothing extra.
Outside of the camping is not so much to do, but we knew this before we booked. For us not a big problem because by car you can go everywhere! Chioggia is verry nice and 1 hour drive, venice 1.5 hour, ferrara 1 hour 20 min. also aquaparks in about 1.5 hour drive from the camping. So enough to do by car.
Yes there are allot of musquitoes, but that's normal over here because of the delta. It's nature! Campings sprays against it 3x a week, but advice is to take also something with you to protect your self a little bit more against them.

As we paid for 2 trailers I decided 2 reviews are allowed.  This place gets 2 stars for the nice animation team and friendly staff but lacks 3 for not fixing broken doors , having dirty trailers, barking dogs and wet dogs that are allover your trailer before you arrive making everything smell very bad inside.
Site itself is ok,  but location too far away from any city. One billion moscitos is vers bad.
Great place for people with children!

name: Las Acebeas
location: Carr. de la Sierra, 23479, Jaén, Spain
comments: Senderismo en un enclave único en Europa

name: Tourist village Cañar
location: Ctra. El Cañar, s/n, 02437 Socovos, Albacete, Spain
comments: Tiri, tiri, tiri   , experiencia inolvidable
Un autentico desastre, muy sucio, sin atención prácticamente; un ejemplo: en las casas ni cambian la ropa de las camas,telarañas por todos sitios
Para acampar horroroso aunque las casas rurales tenían muy buena pinta
Lugar tranquilo para relajarse y desconectar de la rutina
Centro turístico cerca del pantano del Cenajo, dispone de piscina y alojamientos varios un sitio perfecto para disfrutar del campo y de la paz

name: Camping Rubicone
location: Via Matrice Destra, 1, 47039 Savignano Mare, Savignano sul Rubicone FC, Italy
comments:
The location is fairly good and beach is nice. The areas around have seen better days and are a bit worn though.

My main problem with our stay is, as we see from other reviewers as well, the constant noise day and night from the entertainment and the scene which is located in the middle of the site. Starting at around 9 in the morning with various announcements on speakers and loud noises until 2300 from entertainment. Even if you stay not too close you'll hear it very well. Our kids could several evenings not sleep until after 2300 because they where disturbed. We parents as well.

Other sources of noise are the railway passing through the site (every 30 min or so), the tennis court from around 8:00 in the morning, random tolls from the nearby church bells etc... 

And this is every single day.. We where not the only ones who found this to be too much, as others we spoke to mentioned it as well before we said anything.

Besides that.. the play ground is very small and boring for the kids and the pool is also nothing special.

Overall our conclusion is the site itself is nice, but we expected much more for the price, and all the noise ruined our stay.

Will not visit again, there are better places and areas to stay...

Quite big, well organized, clean with lot of services. Electricity at each patch included in price as well as one beach umbrella. Own beach but sea wasn't very clean but that can be expected at this location.

We spent funtastic time on the camping! It's very clean place, very friendly, offers a lot of activities. Good location to visit some nice places - San Marino, Rimini, Ravenna. The shop has good stuff, pizza in the camping restaurant is delicious. Remember about having a swimming cap on the swimming pool.

Absolutely outstanding! Ultra clean, close to the beach, nice restaurants and bars all over the site. Staff friendly and helpful. This is one of the best campsites what I've ever seen. Love the place and definitely go back.
One of Europe's best campings

name: Camping Class of Anthea Giampreti Roberto & C. SAS
location: Viale Catone, 48124 Lido di Dante RA, Italy
comments:
Positive - close to the Adriatica mare;
clean area with food shop, swimming pool and other activities for children. Showers and toilets tidy but sone oth them need to be repared.
clean, quiet, and close to the beach

Campeggio di dimensioni considerevoli diviso in due parti. La prima dispone di case mobili e aree per tende oltre a una piscina olimpionica, un supermercato, un ristorante pizzeria, un campo di calcio, uno di volley, due bar e altri servizi. La seconda parte è naturista (accesso con tessera FKK) e dispone di servizi analoghi, compresa una piscina di dimensioni più piccole ma comunque gradevole. Il livello dei servizi è notevole e molta gente passa weekend e vacanze nel campeggio. Molti sono gli affezionati clienti da più di 15 anni. Il mare, la spiaggia (parte naturista), la pineta e i servizi meritano di passare alcuni giorni al Camping Classe anche perchè i prezzi sono tutto sommato alla portata di tutti.

Mobil home decisamente sporche. Parco giochi x i bimbi trascurato con giochi in brutte condizioni,stessa cosa vale x la piscina.Gli orari del silenzio non vengono rispettati neppure dal personale della struttura.Non c'è un ingresso diretto alla spiaggia.L'aria condizionata si paga a parte,La tele si paga a parte(nonostante i prezzi di soggiorno siano alti x la struttura che è).Lo sconsiglio veramente! Noi non ci torneremo più!
Molto carina. Una esperienza nuova per la mia famiglia. Gli

name: Camping El Robledo
location: Carretera Yelmo, 0 S N, 23379 Segura de la Sierra, Jaén, Spain

name: Village Camping delle Rose
location: Via Nazionale Adriatica, 29, 47043 Gatteo A Mare FC, Italy
comments: September 2017.End of Season. Not crowded. Nice and big swimmingpool. Clean toilets. Good pricing and a little food store. A nice restaurante is also found on the place.
Dusty ground so filled tent with sand and quite loud throughout the night, apart from that nice, clean facilities and nice pool.
Top

Si paga  poco per cui ovviamente non si può pretendere un villaggio a 5 stelle, però c'è veramente mancanza di rispetto verso i clienti. Il ping pong e il carambola tenuti letteralmente da schifo. Giochi per bambini che mangiano i soldi. Le camere non corrispondono alle foto: tv piccolissima e non a schermo piatto come invece mostrato nelle foto sul loro sito e le camere sono piccolissime, sembrava quasi di essere su di un camper. Il cottage sembrava dall'esterno un container. Il bar della piscina chiuso inspiegabilmente. Le uniche note positive sono: la piscina molto grande, il personale e il buon cappuccio con brioche la mattina. Tutto sommato: esperienza  negativa.

Le piazzole non sono grandissime ma il camper ci sta. Comunque ben ombreggiato. I bagni sono puliti. C'è tutto quello che serve, bar ristorante market piscina.
La spiaggia da raggiungere non è proprio comodissima ma c'è il bus navetta. 
Il centro di gatteo a mare è abbastanza comodo da raggiungere in bici.
C'è anche l'animazione.

name: Camping Riopar
comments: Price / quality level is not okė. You pay a lot of money 20€ voor 2 persons with a small tent for a camping ground with only a poor & bad hygienic toiletbuilding and a piteous bar.
Very expensive, lousy facilities.

Muy tranquilo en plena naturaleza. Precioso entorno arbolado con altos pinos. Todo es sombra. No es un camping con instalaciones de lujo de 5 estrellas, es un camping sencillo. Y aún así tiene piscina. Y un sencillo chiringuito donde almorzar o comer algún plato combinado o comprar el pan.  Los propietarios son gente sencilla y muy buenas personas.

como camping bien mucha tranquilidad pero servicio muy mal LOS ASEOS  NO TIENEN TAPADERA NINGUNO UN ROYO DE PAPEL HIGIENICO  PARA TODOS , EL SERVICIO DE LIMPIEZA NEFASTO , LAS BARBACOAS  A PUNTO DE CAERSE AL SUELO ,EL BAR DA PENA EN FIN TODO NECESITA UNA REFORMA, DA PENA

Un entorno muy bueno y el camping en una arbolada.  Defraudados con las instalaciones y las caravanas de alquiler,  no se os ocurra alquilar eso,  moho, suciedad y ácaros para parar un tren,  tercermundista. Los baños solo agua caliente en ducha y solo sale un hilo , wc sin tapa, papel comunitario y no solía haber, el agua para fregar congelada. En general parece un camping abandonado.

name: Cazorla Camping Montillana
location: Carretera Hornos-Tranco km.78.5, Hornos de Segura, 23292 Hornos de Segura, Jaén, Spain
comments: Lovely site with big shady plots. Great pool, good facilities, friendly staff. Full of Spanish families, lots of barbecues, lots of chat. Great hikes straight out the door and wild pigs that comes to the gate at night and eat scraps from the kitchen. Can't get ourselves to leave.

Nice facilities, clean bathrooms, hot showers. It'd be better if there were tables and chairs for tent sites. It's located in the not so touristy part of the park. Really nice lady working at the reception.
Best location in Cazorla. Friendly staff
Heel rustige camping ( begin sept) in prachtige omgeving

Camping de 3a. Atención de primera. Las cabañas necesitan mantenimiento aunque tienen lo necesario.

Maribel y Josefina se deshacen en atenciones con sus clientes.

El pinar es magnífico, tranquilo y precioso, con sendas cercanas de mayor o menor tiempo y dificultad para disfrutar del paraje.

Mi familia y yo tuvimos la oportunidad de visitar el camping con pensión completa y ha sido el mejor acierto de las vacaciones. Comida casera, recién hecha y en su punto. Cualquier cosa que necesitas te la procuran, dentro de sus  posibilidades.
Gracias a las dueñas y a todo el personal que nos han hecho sentir como en casa. Han sido 5 días magníficos. 

Las cabañas en verano de las rifan así que tenlo en cuenta si quieres visitar el parque.

Ah! Está al lado del embalse del tranco. Hidropatines, pádel surf, kayak todo a la mano!

name: Camping Sierra de Peñascosa
location: Carretera de Bogarra, Km. 1, 02313 Peñascosa, Albacete, Spain
comments:
Ce camping est annoncé acsi mais ne l'est pas. 
Calme en pleine nature,  sanitaire bien. 
C est le plus cher de tous les camping en Espagne. 
Avons pris l électricité mais ça a disjoncté. 

20 e pour la nuit
Estuvimos un fin de semana y nos encantó el sitio, es ideal para familias y parejas. Un entorno muy bonito y el personal y las instalaciones muy buenas. Para repetir!
estuvimos en el camping y nos gustó,el lugar es bonito,grande y limpeza en los aseos,está cerca de riopar y de los puntos de interes de los alrededores ,recomendable

Un sitio más que recomendable. Fuimos con un grupo de sesenta niños y tanto los dueños del camping como los encargados del bar se portaron con nosotros perfectamente. Recomiendo este camping por todo.
El sitio es genial. El No Parking y el sofá cama roto del siglo pasado de la cabaña se puede mejorar.  El trato muy bien.

name: Camp Gauto
comments: Best place
Perfect place and the landscape around is wonderful
Otroligt vacker natur.
Bellissima vacanzs
Vackert ställe där du kan koppla av.

name: Camp Polcirkeln
comments: This is a beautiful part of the world and a beautiful family that runs this business. You will have a warm welcome here every time you come. The facilities are extremely clean and well stocked, the store has everything you will need, and there is even a newly built sauna! Well worth a visit for those who like to fish, hunt, gather mushrooms and berries, drive scooters, or just experience breathtaking nature. Highly recommended!
Very quite and nice stop to drink coffee
Mycket trevligt
Trevlig personal och mycket hjälpsamma
God service og hyggelig betjening

name: Holmset Camping og Hytter
comments: Nice place, good service, friendly owner. Good price/quality comparison. Shower free of charge. Free, fast wifi all over the place. Beautiful area. Highly recommendable!
Cycled through here and stayed for one night in June. Nice friendly person running the campsite and good kitchen and shower facilities.
Beautiful campsite with cute log cabins and stunning scenery! Good fishing spot for salmon and trout, I caught a salmon! Great customer service from reception staff, would definitely recommend!!
Nice and clean place. Free wifi which is working literally every ware on a camp, free grill. I can recommend this place!
Clean a₩

name: Camping Selnes
comments: Mooi camping, prachtige stek. Vriendelijke eigenaar. Schoon sanitair. Zoals het hoort.

Eine sehr schöner und ruhiger Campingplatz mit viel Platz. Die Wiese ist an manchen Stellen etwas schräg, was aber mit Auffahrkeilen ausgleichen kann. Es gibt auch einen eben, geschotterten Teil für etwa 8 Plätze. Der Bootsenleger, mit einem Fischhaus, ist über einen Steg zu erreichen. Man kann auch Hütten und Boote in verschiedenen Größen mieten. Zum einkaufen ist es Ca. 4 km und nach Namsos Ca. 11 km. In 10 - 15 min. ist man auch mit dem Boot in Namsos. Abends kann man  Elche sehen.
Sehr nette Leute schöne Landschaft 👍
Super Betreuung

name: Oldernæs Gård
comments:
Ich kam als Alleinreisender mit Rucksack.
Sehr schöner naturbelassener Platz mit Strand und einem riesigen Gelände. Der Empfang ist sehr freundlich und familiär. Habe vom Ufer ein paar leckere Bachforellen gefangen.

name: Føllingstua camping
comments: We were here with a car and a tent. Peaceful and quiet place Nice view from the beach. All the necessities were available in the public spaces and they were clean and tidy. Water boiler and some kettles would have been nice to have in the kitchen.
Nice and tidy.  Great scenery. If you like, you may buy breakfast in the cafe.
Lovely views, canoe rental, good facilities and close to E6 without lots of road noise.

Der Campingplatz wird sehr professionell geführt. Die Sanitäranlagen sind neu und sauber. Duschen kostet 20 NOK. 
Zelte müssen direkt unten am See aufgebaut werden. Dafür werden sie mit einer schönen Aussicht belohnt. Ein Stern Abzug gibt es aber für die fehlende Beleuchtung in diesem Bereich. Abends/Nachts sieht man wirklich gar nichts..

Både bebyggelse og aktiviteter, mm., er av en meget god og gjennomført  standard. Dette med et historisk sus over det hele; sammen med en veldig flott beliggenhet ved Snåsavatnet. Et område som oser av kvalitet!

name: Langnes Camping
comments: Calm and a lot of common room, kids playground and a river nearby(ask for fishing license), lot of hutte and emplacement for camping car both on grass and gravel.

Nice Cottage. The check in was easy. The equipment was ok. The bathroom was modern and in the evening there was enough hot water but not in the morning. The beds were comfortable. Unfortunately the wifi was only available in the public areas. You can park in front of the door.
Clean & practical ☺
Elendige forhold mht gress. Man setter seg fast i gjørme når det blir vått. Aldri met!
Leide en hytte med to soverom. Renholdet var ikke noe særlig bra....

name: Stryn Camping Aksjeselskap
comments: Bigest camping place in the stryn.
Ok

name: Karesuando Camping
comments: First of all, great prices. Got a discount when I said i wanted to stay two nights. There isn't a lot to do in the town, but you can't expect this in the most northern part of Sweden. The cabins are simple but clean and cozy although some modernisation wouldn't hurt, for example the table and seats outside are a bit old. Very nice staff! Tip: when you want to eat out, don't eat in the bar in on the Finnish side (expensive!) but go eat at the Arctic bar. Better prices and better food. Oh, and buy some insect spray!

Helt ok camping. Väldigt hjälpsam man vid incheckning och trevlig miljö. Något gammal stuga och köksartiklar. Bra ställe nere vid älven att se midnattssolen. Finns även möjlighet att gå/åka bil till ett berg där du har utsikt över Sverige, Norge och Danmark. När vi skulle gå dit var det dock väldigt blött i början av stigen så vi tog oss aldrig till toppen.
Der Campinhplatz war nicht schlecht. Das Personal ist freundlich. Das neue Badehaus war sehr schön. Aber es waren auch einige Baustellen, die nicht so schön  waren.
Laestadius botaniska tradgård förfaller. Inget underhåll pågår. Ett arbetsmarknads projekt/ beredskapsarbete utan uppföljning.

Rolig, imøtekommende og hyggelig.😄
Mest for fiskere, jegere og bærplukkere. 🐟🦌🍇

name: Sandlövs Camping
comments: Hjälpsam värd som såg till att vi fick plats med husbil över natten. Tar varken kort eller Swish, se till att ha kontanter redo om du inte vill åka på en uttagsavgift i någon av butikerna i Karesuando.
Tack Ulf som fixade stuga smidigt till oss! Dagen har bestått av bestigning av kebnekaise, imorgon väntas treriksröset! Kan behövas en upprustning men dög nog till oss som bara är på förbifarten. :)
Uhygienisk toalettømming.Ingen kjøkken.
Fin camping som ligger centralt.
Färskvatten och toatömning precis bredvid varandra kändes icke ok.

name: Rellingen
comments: Et nydelig fristed med frisk og naturlig dyrket mat.

Panu Gudmundovi wszystkiego najlepszego, to miły człowiek i bardzo pogodny. Domek jest w świetnym miejscu, można stamtąd dojechać do Geiranger w kilkanaście minut, na Trollstigen też jest niedaleko, Dalsnibba i wiele innych atrakcji w zasięgu. Domek jest fajny i całkiem tani. Polecam serdecznie.

name: Folven Camping Afterski Café
comments: Muy bonito el sitio, la cabaña, barato siendo 4 (80e 4camas) con cocina y baño propio!muy agradables, facilitándonos la entrada en horario muy español!;)me gustó mucho!
Buena ubicación y muy familiar aunque un poco pequeño

name: Stordal Camping
comments: Great place. Self cooking. Quiet

Lovely place right next to the fjord. You need a keycard for going to the loo and to the washing room that makes it feel extra safe but not very practical when you have arms full of dirty dishes and a towel that you have to put on the ground to open the door but the overall price/quality ratio is OK. 7,5/10
Very nice and quiet camping dpot. Landscape is very nice but the town isnt very attractive. Free Internet.
A lot of space for tents. New shower /toilet building. WiFi all over the campsite.  Very clean and all for a good price ,  we will definitely come back.
Very good camp site.

name: Camp Ripan
comments: Really comfortable cabins, with comfortable beds and good showers. The facilities at the hotel are good also, with a pool and spa for those who want to relax. The staff were quite pleasant and went out of their way to make our stay quite enjoyable. The restaurant is also one of the better places to eat in town. Also very convenient if you want to do the Midnattsolstigen (midnight sun walk, about 4 - 5 km round trip)!

Amazing dinner, really high quality modern food, also bigger portion than it looks on the pictures. On the negative side... We wanted to have a drink after dinner and the waiter recommended the 'northern light sky view' on the top of this building. We got really excited as this is exactly what we wanted and purchased two drinks for 200sek then we realized that the 'sky view' is a joke, it is a a kind of salon with sofas however the light is on in the building and obviously everything is reflecting in the window therefore it is not possible to see the sky at all - it should be a dark(ish) room. We asked the staff and they seemed to be surprised and did not know how to turn off the lights?! We wasted quite a bit of money for an average cocktail in this strange salon (no other ppl whatsoever) but I really recommend the restaurant.
The location is amazing .A Paradise for winter and watch the Northern Light . Breakfast deligous .The Team is very friendly and helpfully .The Room are warm and Beautiful .
Great service and nice dining hall. OK pricing on food, great pricing on drinks.
Very good restaurant!! We only stayed one night but you should not miss the dinner restaurant!

name: Craigdhu Caravan Camping Site
location: Bettyhill, Thurso, Caithness, Scotland, KW14 7SP, Thurso KW14 7SP, UK
comments: We were here in September.  It was cold and wet. The camp site was fine. Had hot water. Working toilets . Plenty of electric pitches. Nearby the hotel had hot meals. Really friendly place. Great food.    Two small hotbgood sites within walking distance.

As a place to pitch a tent for the night, this site is just fine. The grass was short, the toilets worked, the water was hot and the views were wonderful. There are no kitchen facilities or play areas or other frills, and yes, the shower/toilet block is old and leaky, but it was clean and there was toilet paper. All for £5 per person, basically paid on the honour system as the woman who collects the money lives up the hill.

The campsite is basically just a field with a few abandoned old caravans scattered around.  The toilet/shower block is awful, falling apart and stinking, it really needs demolished and rebuilt.  The entrance drive is badly potholed so watch out if you do actually try to go there.  I wouldn't recommend it.  The popularity of the NC500 has enabled lots of businesses to cash in and provide excellent facilities for tourists, unfortunately Craigdhu has fallen behind the times.

Facilities are in rough shape and other reviews here and on TripAdvisor reflect this. So much so that I nearly adjusted my daily mileage while cycle touring in order to avoid staying here. In the end I decided I'd either stay here or just wild camp at the edge of the village if it was really that bad. I'm glad I didn't adjust my plans based on other online reviews though. Toilets, showers, sinks, etc all work fine and are sanitary despite being thoroughly unappealing. For a cycle tourist a warm shower is still a warm shower, even if it feels like you've snuck into abandoned facilities that were built by the Dharma Initiative 50 years ago.

Putting everything into perspective, if I had never seen the facilities at another campsite then I don't think I could really find anything to complain about at Craigdhu. It's just that there are a lot of other sites around the North Coast that are appointed to a much higher standard.

If your ideal itinerary has you staying here for a night or two then I'd say go for it, but if you're looking for a destination campsite you might want to look elsewhere.

So disgusting we didn't even stay.  The owner should be ashamed.  The toilets looked like they were some sort of squatters block that hadn't seen a sponge or mop since it was built in the 40's. 
The static caravans looked no better,  I'm shocked anyone pays to actually stay in them.  
It's a real shame because the position and view is really good,  but let down by a greedy/lazy owner who clearly has no love for his park.

name: Hotel
comments:
wonderful place on the mountain near the lake
the nature very nice with very good view from the room, but the hotel not so good. too small room and the heating from the ceiling but
Nice nature here the lake is wonderful but ROM in the hotel not very good
Nice place, spectacular nature and reasonable prices.
Flott sted med mange fine turmuligheter

name: Repparfjord Camping and Misjonssenter
comments: Mökki ilman suihkua ja vessaa 400 kruunua mutta yleinen suihku ja wc siistit. Suihku maksullinen. Omistaja mukava. Pyykinpesukone löytyy ja tiskipaikka myös. Tähän mennessä siistein mukavin ja lämpimin mökkipaikka missä on oltu. Mökit todella tilavia ja mukavia.

Hintaansa nähden erinomainen paikka. Hyvällä etäisyydellä hammerfestistä ja nordkappista. Mökit siistit ja lämpimät. Yleinen suihku ok maksullinen. Vessat siistit. Pyykinpesukone ja tiskauspaikka. Sauna vuokrattavissa. Omistaja mukava.
Der sauberste Platz den ich auf 4000km in N kennengelernt habe und schön angelegt.Die Hütten großzügig. Einfach perfekt.
Sehr sauber und günstiger Campingplatz! Ist zu empfehlen auf dem Weg zum Nordkapp.
Liten trevlig camping, dusch kostar extra.

name: Pitgrudy Holiday and Residential Park
comments:
Had a fantastic week up here. Stayed in 31 wonderful  chalet /caravan  equipped with everything you could need.
The park itself is clean and immaculately kept. 
If your looking for peace and quiet this is the place to be. We were told by locals we picked the best one and we have to agree.
 Visited 2nd - 9th September

Stayed in a static caravan for a few nights. The site is very well kept and it's lovely and quiet with faultless views. The staff and residents are all very friendly. Would highly recommend and have already booked again for next year.

Such a lovely peaceful place. Stunning views over the Dornoch Firth. The park is very tidy and the hard standing touring pitches serviced with water and electricity which is a bonus. As are most of the camping pitches.

The manager Amy and her staff are very helpful and always have time to stop for a blether and advise us on places to visit and eat/drink etc. They have a lovely selection of new homes for sale on the upper areas of the park which may be of interest once the towing days are over.
A lovely little community within walking distance on the town. We will continue to return to meet up with our friends at this lovely little park.
Beautiful, quiet ,friendly & very clean & tidy
Value for money.

name: Grannie's Heilan Hame Holiday Park
comments:
Grannies Heilan Hame has a lot to be pleased with. The location is stunning and the beach is perfect for quiet nights under the stars. I found most of the staff to be pleasant and will be returning at some point without a doubt.. Negatives are few and far between however, when I arrived there seems to have been a communication issue as I pitched my tent where I had been instructed to do so The next day a caravan pulled up as they had been instructed to pitch there one visit to reception sorted that, or so I thought, next day another couple pulled up saying that they had been given the same slot. Yet another visit to reception and that got sorted but twice kind of left a bad taste in our mouths. Speaking of bad tastes the Chip-shop leaves a lot to be desired as it looks like the use oven chips in their fryer and they just oozed with grease. I blame this for my sons many visits to the toilet during the night and spoiling one of his days there. To have a sign on a disabled toilet stating a deposit of £10.00 was required for the key cannot be right as a Health and Safety Practitioner I couldn't think of a worse thing to say to any disabled person when able bodied were not required to pay any deposit.
I have to mention your maintenance guy Mark who became our holiday hero. I asked him if he could pop down and help start my car when he turned up and found out I had a spare battery he took the time to help me install it with a smile on his face. A few issues easily resolved  could have moved this review to 5 stars. Communication Communication Communication

Excellent caravan park, big pitches & toilets kept clean with hot water 24hrs a day. Entertainment staff are fantastic, really enjoy their job which comes across. Excellent for dog lovers & walks along the beach. Highly recommend.

Pretty to hard to fault..   Stunning beach on your doorstep,  Tidy caravan, well kept grounds,   if your after a relaxing get away from it all, this is the place. lovely Dornoch nearby,  Only criticism would be there needs to be more lighting at night, many of the lights on our seafront road were out.

Brilliant place for a quiet get away with the kids.  Lucky enough to have a caravan right on the beach front so great views.  Not a huge campsite so don't expect masses of entertainment but there is enough to keep kids occupied for a few days to a week.

We will never return. Area is lovely, but it's all gambling and the entertainment lounge is way too loud for any  possible communication with anybody else there.
Teenager's are pushed out of the games area by overweight adults on slot machines

name: Wick Caravan & Camping Site
comments: One of the best sites I have ever visited. Very friendly and helpfull staff. Plenty of space, clean and well kept facilities. Walking distance along the river to town (15 min max) with choice of eateries and pubs.
Lovely site friendly folk gr8 location shower n toilet block bit dated but very clean
Nice hot showers! Helpful and friendly!
Lovely place, friendly staff. I'll be back

June 2016.    Very peaceful, tranquil, clean and well kept site, stayed 7 nights in tents. Ideally situated on the North Coast 500 route and for exploring north east Scotland. Located adjacent to the river Wick, it is a short walk to the town. This site is family owned, I have visited many times and have always found them to be welcoming and friendly. I always look forward to return visits.

name: Nesjartun Camping
comments: Small camp but it has everything necessary - fully equipped small clean kitchen (free use of everything), 2 practical showers (one for ladies, one for men, we appreciated really hot water, 6 min for 10 NOK), toilets and bathrooms are older but clean!! Prices 200 NOK car, 30 NOK washing machine, 10 NOK coines to shower for 6 min. We arrived almost at night but staff was friendly. Recommend! August 2017
Good service. Nice view. Facilities in strong need of a full renewal. (Also, not many wild Pokémon observed at this location.)
Clean place with very good location, wifi is weak but stable.

Haben den Campingplatz als "Nothalt" aufgrund von Regen und Müdigkeit angefahren. Keine einzige Hütte war belegt, alle anderen Campingplätze waren voll!
Sanitäranlagen mau, duschen kostet extra, WLAN / Handynetz. Preis/Leistung unterirdisch.
Die kleinste Hütte, schlechte Ausstattung 37€.

Rolig, selv med hovedvei rett ved. Hyggelige og hjelpsomme eiere. 
Ikke så bra mobilnett eller wifi, men det er jo ikke derfor man er på ferie? :-D

name: Dunnet Bay Caravan and Motorhome Club Site
location: Dunnet Bay Club Site, Dunnet, Thurso, Highlands KW14 8XD, UK
comments: Great little site beside a fabulous beach. Facilities are immaculate like all club sites. Pitches are all grass but the ground drains reasonably on all but a few. It is quite near the road so there is some road noise on the back pitches but only during the day.
Great site next to the beach and the beach is sandy and just goes on and on .....grest facilities. ..but its best to book first....a popular site and it gets fully booked
Open grassy site with expected caravan club facilities.  Path down through dunes which obscure view to a spectacular sandy beach. Views across to Orkney and RSPB cliffs

Good caravan club site all facilities very clean although others say it is a peaceful site I would add that the noise from the main road is quite intrusive at night and also because it is a 1night stop place for many the noise made by people departing early can affect those wanting a bit of a sleep in on a morning whilst the site is all grass and in my opinion should stay that way I think the club could level some of the pitches out in the closed season by adding top soil and seeding as more and more motorhome are getting heavier this should be undertaken 
 regularly

Nice site with beautiful beach!!
Pitches not very well laid out. Creating some pitch overrun

name: Cobar Caravan Park
comments:
The site was a drive through site with plenty of room. The older toilet block was clean but broken basin needs replacing. No hand cleaner in the dispenser and no hand towels.  There is a newer amenities block but did not use it as it was a little further away. 

Otherwise park well set out and convenient to town. Staff were friendly. Would like to see  an extension of concrete slab to accommodate van awning instead of red soil. Thanks - Keith.
Pleasant surrounds with a variety of bird life. Clean amenities. Helpful staff. Easy access.

Good campsite
Staff friendly and helpful even arranged for firewood to be chopped for me so I could have a camp fire.
Container Cabin well fitted out perfect for a short stay
I have stayed here over the last 8 years and is one of my favorite parks, very friendly staff plus always clean and tidy,nice and quiet,I will keep staying here.

Stopped here the night of 13th november 2017. Quite a large caravan park with large, grassy sites. Good amenities block, fantastic camp kitchen. Highlight of the stay was saying g'day to the maintenance man this morning as he was cleaning the camp kitchen :-) otherwise, just a quick stop over  (5 stars is for his friendliness and big smile)

name: 7 Oaks Sapphire Fossicking And Bush Camping
comments: Been coming here for a few years. Campsite is like a slice of heaven. Absolute peace and natural beauty. Peter and Nicole are wonderful people. Found a 3.5ct Blue Sapphire on my first trip! :-D
As always it was a great out and it was nice to find some 'cutters'. Very pleasant surroundings with basic amenities.

We had a wonderful day fossicking at 7Oaks. The set up was great! Had a picnic under the trees - water & dunny's supplied! Found a few sapphires - not good enough to retire on - but it was fun looking. Many thanks for a great day. :)

name: Pindari Dam
comments: Beautiful free camping with hot showers. Perfect views.

This place is utopia if you enjoy fishing and camping; whether for a weekend or a week. There is plenty of room for your tent or camper. Ample toilets, garbage bins, and picnic shelters - but nothing else, so make sure you bring everything that you will need.
The road to Pindari from the west is the best way to get here, as it is all bitumen. If you come from the east, you will need to travel many kilometres of gravel road. Whichever direction you come from, it's a great drive in the country.
Bring the family out to the dam for one day and have a picnic, you'll enjoy it.

name: Kemping Otel'
location: Ulitsa Veresova, 33, Arshan, Buryatiya Republits, Russia, 671023

name: Mesto Stoyanki Na Ostrove
comments: Где-то поблизости есть очень интересное место. Сначала очень удивились: небольшая "лужица", несколько дощечек-мостиков,  на которых сидят люди и чего-то ждут. Оказалось, что это целебный источник. Со дна иногда поднимаются пузырьки с целебным газом. Нужно поймать пузырек, зачерпнуть вместе с водой и промыть глаза. Можно попробовать набрать воды с пузырьками в бутылку, но это, по-моему, невозможно.

Самое красивое место - это Аршан! Живописный ,наполненый горным воздухом поселок -заставляет каждый раз приезжать сюда. Невозможно быть здесь и не обойти окресности . Горы - завараживают своей красотой.

Всё хорошо, но раздражают эти попрошайки которые берут деньги за вход, якобы на развитие территории, не хотят работать видимо. Ну и как обычно, тряпки как мусор на деревьях и разрисованные скальники по типу "здесь был Вася" - очень портят натуральный природный вид...
Сакральные места Аршана. Чтите местных богов. Думайте только о хорошем.
Оставило много воспоминаний, особенно когда машина застряла в песке

name: สะตอเฮ้าส์ Satorhouse
location: 20/2 หมู่ 5 คุ้มท่าเข้ ต.หาดทรายรี อ.เมือง ชุมพร Amphoe Mueang Chumphon, Chang Wat Chumphon 86000, Thailand

name: Lake Jipe Campsite
comments:
This place is a hidden gem. You will love the tented rooms and the price is fair on the upper side of your wallet since they charge per head, not per room. The food is ok for a place that makes their meals fresh on order since they don't get much visitors' traffic. The road to the lodge is a piece of art, don't go without a 4WD. Visa/MasterCard/Amex don't work although there is a beautiful sign that says they accept cards, cash rules on this side or the plains. 
If you are lucky like our group, elephants will be grazing nearby.

access road is awful

4x4 is must 

very fantastic night there 
with roaring hippo all the night 
they are only 20m
and sunset to the lake is perfect

you must bring your food and drink

room is clean and hot shower is good

name: Campers creek
comments: Inexpensive getaway! Highly recommend.
Simply Superb place ☺️

name: Heavens Ledge - Campsite
location: 436/2 Kaybros, Gowri Estate, Semmanatham, Yercaud, Tamil Nadu 636602, India
comments: Beautiful location in the middle of the plantation. The campsite is not high on luxury as it pays attention to being eco-friendly, right from the plates to the way the construction is done. The staff are local hill tribes who are friendly and go out of their way to make your stay comfortable
Truly heavens ledge. Beautiful place. Perfect getaway to relax with friends and family.
Great place to enjoy alone or with loved ones ,good service too. I was all alone when it rained gracefully!
An awesome place very beautiful view of the sunrise and the sunset . Different experience which was very pleasant and peaceful.

This place is amazing of you at looking for a weekend escape from all the city sounds.
It is serene and very close to nature. The heaven's ledge in particular is also a very good place and people are too cooperative..you can go and enjoy without a second thought.

name: Danau Lebar
location: Danau lebar,, Setia Budi, Teras Terunjam, Mukomuko Regency, Bengkulu 38711, Indonesia
comments: Sebuah danau yg masih asri,  nyaman.  Namun sayang kurang mendapat perhatian dr pemerintah maupun swasta.
Sedikit kotor
Belum dikembangkan
Sejuk...
Bagus tapi terlalu jauh dri sasaran wisatawan

name: Menzi Beach Park and Campsite
location: Martinez Ave, Mati, Davao Oriental, Philippines
comments: Great place to spend some R&R time with family and friends. The place has cottages and tables, plus they allow tent rentals. There is enough parking space. The beach - breathtaking. The waves - surf-worthy. The sand - powder-like. The cleanliness is maintained. Personnel empty the trash bins per cottage/area from time to time, and also make sure they accommodate you upon arrival. The management made sure they maintained the natural ambience by keeping the trees and other plants as is. The only problem was the comfort room: non-functioning toilet flushes and faucets in the washing area plus very low water pressure. My best friend and I had to share showers and before we were done, 4 people + 2 kids were waiting in line for us to finish. They should have made sure there was enough water pressure to accommodate the amount of customers and their bathing/washing needs. Though the good part was that maintenance personnel kept it acceptably clean; however, they stopped ‘caring’ once customers started flooding in. Dogs and cats were also roaming around which should somehow have been controlled. All in all, it was a great experience and we would still come back. I would also recommend this to my family and friends. Hopefully, improvements would be made with the CR soon.

Nice resort with cottages but it gets full during the weekend.  You can stay in the beach though and have a picnic.  Tents are available but can only be rented for the evening.  The water is clear but you have to fight waves during swimming.  The ambiance is perfect for romantic dates or solitary reminisce.
Nice for surfer. But not for smaller kids. Bigger waves and the current coyld be dangerous.

A wide beach front and open cottages, a great place to relax and enjoy the sun, sand, wind, and the sound of waves. For the not so excellent swimmers, the water is enjoyable when it's calm. The waves here are too short for surfing, but it's big for swimmers. The price is reasonable compared to other beaches. The toilets are clean and have running water. There some stores wherein you can borrow utensils or have them cook the food you bought from the wet market. Banig, tents, mosquito nets, and boards can be rented here as well. This area is safe since it is government  managed. This place is popular on the weekends
Resort is clean and secured. No rooms, only open cottages and tents so if you have a tent, bring it. Beach is amazing!

name: مجتمع نپار سرخرود
location: Mazandaran Province, Sorkh Roud, West Bustan, Iran

name: پادگان آموزشی سپاه المهدی
comments: من تازه اعزامم
لایک به همه سربازای پادگان ولیک

name: پارکینگ
comments: Voll von Menschen

name: Al'plager' Aktru
comments: отличное место, красота гор, теплые домики, хорошая баня

name: Territoriya Rybolovnoy Rekreatsii "Staryy Lyutich"
comments: Отличный отдых- природа, рыбалка, тишина. Если хотите показать ребенку, как ловить рыбу, лучше места не найти.
Хорошее место, душевное

name: "Al'yans" - Kartodrom, Karting, Kemping V Breste
location: г.Брест р-он Военный городок 108. Красный двор, картинговый стадион., Brest 224022, Belarus
comments: Просто здорово. Трасса большая. Можно с детьми. Есть детский картинг и двухместный для взрослого с ребенком. Инструктаж проводят под подпись.

Отличная трасса, круг достаточно большой и извилистый. Интересно соревноваться большой компанией. Единственный минус- ограничение скорости, педаль газа можно вообще не отпускать на повороте. Было бы приятно еслиб максимальную скорость увеличили.

Карты убитые. 
Когда набираешь скорость начитает трясти. На других картодромах такое замечено не было
Единственный плюс - протяженность трассы

Все понравилось. Чистая, ухоженая территория, вменяемый персонал. 
Лучшая в Бресте трасса для картов.

Цены адекватные, карты так себе, но из них просто не выжимают полную мощность, ибо их разобьют)
Трасса интересная, эмоций куча. Мне очень понравилось, ничего лишнего)

name: Campingplatz & Herberge Grein
comments:
PROS: quite shady, a view of the river (if you are lucky), within walking distance from the town center and nice restaurants, you can camp wherever you want to, no official plaque, no checks by the manager...
CONS: manager (not Austrian !!!) doesn't care much about the condition of the campground and the washrooms, a bit disorganized (seems more interested in dealing with cars and offering taxi rides to events in the area), campground rather expensive and dark at night, close to main road, drainage after rain almost nonexistent...

Very expensive (€ 26 for tent, two adults, one child) and very noisy from heavy traffic. Sanitary building was dirty. The restaurant looked like a western saloon, and the owner was tired of his job. All in all - don't go there if you can avoid it. Positive things: Shade from trees, and a lot of space to pitch tent.

Wery dirty, cleaning toilets only once in a day,  no control, what is happening in camp,  a family washed (bath)  their kids in dishwasher sink, nobody didn t reacted.  Too high price for service.  Eitherway,  place is nice,  nice grass and shadow,  but... guest are,  obviosly what this camp deserves. Dirty and rude
Toilets and showers were good. Otherwise a standard campsite.
Stunning location. Really. We took the cute mobile house which was really comfy. In the campaign there is pretty good restaurant which is rare. The small town is pretty, worth a visit.

name: Campingplatz Kasten
comments: Good price, clean toilets, beautifull place.

Das ist ein Platz für Dauercamper mit nur wenigen Plätzen für Tagesgäste.

Wir waren zwei Erwachsene ohne Kinder. Und haben die Donau zum angeln genutzt. Optimal.

Alle Formalien und Abwicklungen wurden unkompliziert und schnell erledigt.

Sehr sauber! Sehr günstig!

Gerne wieder
Ottima gestione della proprietaria e prezzi modici. 19,00€ a notte per un camper e tre persone, comprensivo di elettricità. Servizi puliti e belli. Consigliatissimo.

Auf meiner Kanufahrt von Bamberg nach Belgrad habe ich hier gerne Halt gemacht. Frau Fasching (Platzwartin) ist ein absolutes Unikum, mit einem tollen Humor. Der Platz ist sehr schön gelegen. Die Anlagen sauber.
Die Dame, die sich um den Campingplatz kümmert ist eine sehr umsichtige Seele mit Herz. Habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Anlagen sind super sauber!  Dankeschön :-)

name: Gasthof/Camping Tirolerhof
comments: Very quiet and paceful

Prijs op internet 10 euro, toen we aankwamen moesten we 26 euro betalen omdat volgens de eigenaar de internetprijs onjuist was. 26 euro voor een caravanplek (grasveld/voortuin van het huis) incl stroom met verder niets vind ik behoorlijk prijzig er is behalve sanitair en stroom verder niets. Er is 1 ruime douche en enkele toiletten. Sanitair is prima en schoon. De varkensstal wordt mechanisch geventileerd. Gelijk aan het geluid van een koelwagen hier sta je niet direct naast, voor ons niet storend maar je hoort het wel. Wij kwamen op woensdag om 18.30u aan en konden hier niet warm eten. Er was wel genoeg ruimte om de caravan aangekoppeld te laten achter de auto.

Gewoon een stuk tuin waarin je kon camperen. Geen kaart voor restaurant maar schnitzel en patat waren verder prima. 1 douche met daarbij ook het afwas gedeelte. Niet erg handig. Sanitair wel schoon. Je kon de varkens goed horen. Typische boerencamping. Heerlijk rustig  s nachts. We komen  nog eens terug als we in de buurt zijn. Cash geld mee. Je kan niet pinnen.
Toller Platz  sehr gastfreundlich. Essen und Trinken gut. Duschen und wc sehr sauber. Nachtruhe außerordentlich  leise. Morgens 20 Enten  zur Begrüßung auf der Wiese.  Wir kommen wieder - DANKE
Problemlos einen Zwischenstop machen oder mal schnell einen ganzen Tag in dir Therme nach Bad Schallerbach

name: Campingplatz Haslach
comments: Nice camping experience. We had to pay 14 € for 2 people and a tent, but there was a shower and washing area, as well as water closets. We had to run after them to give them their money, since we arrived late, and nobody was at the restaurant, and the town hall had already closed, so I had to go in the morning. The city is nice and worth a visit!
Sehr einfacher Campingplatz der durch seine Lage direkt an der Mühl besticht. Keine Voranmeldung möglich, ist wahrscheinlich auch nicht nötig, da wir das einzige Zelt waren. Kommen sicher wieder.
Schöne stille doch die kinder sind öfters lästig

name: Camping Hofmühle
comments: Frendly and nice owners. Food excellent with moderate prices. Hospitallity and house atmosphere. Simply to be recommended to everyone!

Sehr Gastfreundlich! Tolles Essen, große Portionen. Machen fast alle größeren Festlichkeiten bei Familie Binder, es passt immer super und die Chefleute sind immer sehr bemüht. Zwanglos und Gemütlichkeit steht im Vordergrund.
Schöne ruhige Lage. Freundliche Bedienung duch das Betreiber-Ehepaar. Nicht zu verachten ist die köstliche regionale Küche.

Posto molto tranquillo. Servizio fantastico e molto gentile! 
Siamo stati contenti e trattati molto bene, torneremo di sicuro :)
toller und wunderschön ruhig gelegener campingplatz direkt am fluss. extrem nettes personal und gutes essen! immer wieder gerne.

name: Campeggio ai Bosconi
comments: Very nice place, very friendly owners although because of the WiFi not working and the total of 2 showers, 4 stars.

Very nice place, it's a small family affair with only few places for large campers. Everything is really clean and the owner is very nice & welcoming. It's a quiet place and you can enjoy the beach located at 2 mins walk. You can find small supermarket & restaurant in the surrounding and a train station is close to it.
Kleine und ruhige Campingoase. Sehr freundlich und sauber. Auch Hunde sind willkommen!

Sehr freundlich und ganz unkompliziert.
Gratis strandbad und günstige preise.
Alles in einem schönen kleinen dörfchen.
Echt super zeltplatz
Kleiner und gepflegter Platz - Sanitärräume sauber - toll zum Zelten oder mit dem Bulli.

name: Camping-Linz am Pichlingersee
comments: Nice little camp field though probably not for those looking for quiet rest - too close to a busy highway, railway track and airport's runway.
Perfect place camping, very clean and Green!
Stayed one night, rather boring place, average costs, toilets and showers ok.
Clean and nice place. Quite small but it's not a disadvantage. It's located at a small lake to which there is no direct access from the camping.

Probably the worst campsite I used on my week long tour of the Danube. It's  a fair cycle ride to Linz. 50 cents to use the showers if I remember rightly. The pitch has hardly any grass on it. The attached restaurant was OK though.

name: Camping an der Donau
comments: Super shower, super camp, and silence with beauty sights...
Nice camping
Buon campeggio. Abbastanza tranquillo, bagni piccoli e un po' lontani. Docce calde. In riva al Danubio, che però non è blu, ma marrone perché è il tratto subito dopo la confluenza con l'Inn
Piccolo campeggio lungo la riva destra del Danubio, nel primo tratto. Immersa tra le montagne. Luogo molto tranquillo.
Besuche jedes Jahr dort meine Verwandschaft. Campingplatz mit Blick auf die Donau, Ufer mit Steine und Sand, Freibad, jedes mal nette Leute,... einfach alles da was man braucht.

name: Campeggio Lago Maggiore
comments: Jedes mal werde ich sehr freundlich empfangen! Und jedes mal habe ich auf dem gepflegten Camping Platz ein wunderschöner Platz auch ohne Voranmeldung bekommen. Der Sand Strand am Lago Maggiore bringt mich immer in Ferienstimmung.Sehr gepflegt und mit dem Zelt, hatte ich noch nie zusätzliche kosten für den Strom bezahlt. Nur zum Empfehlen!

Ein toller Campingplatz um nicht zu sagen, der beste, den wir als Familie mit kleinen Kindern überhaupt angesteuert haben. Ruhig, großzügige Parzellen, mehrere, sehr saubere Waschhäuser, mehrere Spielplätze, dazu ein schöner, nicht überlaufener Sandstrand. Viel Baumbestand für schattig kühle Plätze. Der Laden am Platz ist gut sortiert mit fairen Preisen. Dazu sehr viele Möglichkeiten für Unternehmungen im Umkreis von wenigen km. Abschließend, und eigentlich bin ich eher kritisch, sehr freundliches und zuvorkommendes Personal! Wir kommen sicher wieder!

Ein schöner Campingplatz! Direkt am See. Sehr schöne Aussicht. Sehr saubere, grosse Sanitäranlagen. 
Für Kinder viel Platz zum Spielen.
Nettes Personal. 
Nur leider sehr teuer im Vergleich zu vielen anderen Campinglpätzen... für 2 Kinder und 2 Erwachsene.
Pulito e ordinato. Atmosfera rilassante. Location stupenda

War sehr schön. Wir konnten die Ferien richtig geniessen. Alles Anlage waren sehr sauber. Die Angestellten wsren auch sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Preiswert.

War bestimmt nicht mein letztes mal auf dem Campingplatz in den Ferien.

name: Campeggio Rivabella
